name: Finset.sup_mul_le_mul_sup_of_nonneg
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : MonoidWithZero M₀
s : Finset ι
a b : ι → M₀
inst✝³ : SemilatticeSup M₀
inst✝² : OrderBot M₀
inst✝¹ : PosMulMono M₀
inst✝ : MulPosMono M₀
ha : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (a i)
hb : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (b i)
⊢ LE.le (s.sup (HMul.hMul a b)) (HMul.hMul (s.sup a) (s.sup b))
decl:
lemma sup_mul_le_mul_sup_of_nonneg [SemilatticeSup M₀] [OrderBot M₀] [PosMulMono M₀] [MulPosMono M₀]
    (ha : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ a i) (hb : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ b i) : s.sup (a * b) ≤ s.sup a * s.sup b :=
  Finset.sup_le fun _i hi ↦
    mul_le_mul (le_sup hi) (le_sup hi) (hb _ hi) ((ha _ hi).trans <| le_sup hi)

name: Finset.mul_inf_le_inf_mul_of_nonneg
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : MonoidWithZero M₀
s : Finset ι
a b : ι → M₀
inst✝³ : SemilatticeInf M₀
inst✝² : OrderTop M₀
inst✝¹ : PosMulMono M₀
inst✝ : MulPosMono M₀
ha : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (a i)
hb : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (b i)
⊢ LE.le (HMul.hMul (s.inf a) (s.inf b)) (s.inf (HMul.hMul a b))
decl:
lemma mul_inf_le_inf_mul_of_nonneg [SemilatticeInf M₀] [OrderTop M₀] [PosMulMono M₀] [MulPosMono M₀]
    (ha : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ a i) (hb : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ b i) : s.inf a * s.inf b ≤ s.inf (a * b) :=
  Finset.le_inf fun i hi ↦ mul_le_mul (inf_le hi) (inf_le hi) (Finset.le_inf hb) (ha i hi)

name: Finset.sup'_mul_le_mul_sup'_of_nonneg
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝³ : MonoidWithZero M₀
s : Finset ι
a b : ι → M₀
inst✝² : SemilatticeSup M₀
inst✝¹ : PosMulMono M₀
inst✝ : MulPosMono M₀
ha : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (a i)
hb : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (b i)
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ LE.le (s.sup' hs (HMul.hMul a b)) (HMul.hMul (s.sup' hs a) (s.sup' hs b))
decl:
lemma sup'_mul_le_mul_sup'_of_nonneg [SemilatticeSup M₀] [PosMulMono M₀] [MulPosMono M₀]
    (ha : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ a i) (hb : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ b i) (hs) :
    s.sup' hs (a * b) ≤ s.sup' hs a * s.sup' hs b :=
  sup'_le _ _ fun _i hi ↦
    mul_le_mul (le_sup' _ hi) (le_sup' _ hi) (hb _ hi) ((ha _ hi).trans <| le_sup' _ hi)

name: Finset.inf'_mul_le_mul_inf'_of_nonneg
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝³ : MonoidWithZero M₀
s : Finset ι
a b : ι → M₀
inst✝² : SemilatticeInf M₀
inst✝¹ : PosMulMono M₀
inst✝ : MulPosMono M₀
ha : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (a i)
hb : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le 0 (b i)
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ LE.le (HMul.hMul (s.inf' hs a) (s.inf' hs b)) (s.inf' hs (HMul.hMul a b))
decl:
lemma inf'_mul_le_mul_inf'_of_nonneg [SemilatticeInf M₀] [PosMulMono M₀] [MulPosMono M₀]
    (ha : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ a i) (hb : ∀ i ∈ s, 0 ≤ b i) (hs) :
    s.inf' hs a * s.inf' hs b ≤ s.inf' hs (a * b) :=
  le_inf' _ _ fun _i hi ↦ mul_le_mul (inf'_le _ hi) (inf'_le _ hi) (le_inf' _ _ hb) (ha _ hi)

name: Finset.sup'_mul₀
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G₀ : Type u_3
inst✝³ : GroupWithZero G₀
inst✝² : SemilatticeSup G₀
a : G₀
inst✝¹ : MulPosMono G₀
inst✝ : MulPosReflectLE G₀
ha : LT.lt 0 a
f : ι → G₀
s : Finset ι
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (s.sup' hs f) a) (s.sup' hs fun i => HMul.hMul (f i) a)
decl:
lemma sup'_mul₀ [MulPosMono G₀] [MulPosReflectLE G₀] (ha : 0 < a) (f : ι → G₀) (s : Finset ι) (hs) :
    s.sup' hs f * a = s.sup' hs fun i ↦ f i * a := map_finset_sup' (OrderIso.mulRight₀ _ ha) hs f

name: Finset.mul₀_sup'
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G₀ : Type u_3
inst✝³ : GroupWithZero G₀
inst✝² : SemilatticeSup G₀
a : G₀
inst✝¹ : PosMulMono G₀
inst✝ : PosMulReflectLE G₀
ha : LT.lt 0 a
f : ι → G₀
s : Finset ι
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul a (s.sup' hs f)) (s.sup' hs fun i => HMul.hMul a (f i))
decl:
set_option linter.docPrime false in
lemma mul₀_sup' [PosMulMono G₀] [PosMulReflectLE G₀] (ha : 0 < a) (f : ι → G₀) (s : Finset ι) (hs) :
    a * s.sup' hs f = s.sup' hs fun i ↦ a * f i := map_finset_sup' (OrderIso.mulLeft₀ _ ha) hs f

name: Finset.sup'_div₀
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G₀ : Type u_3
inst✝⁵ : GroupWithZero G₀
inst✝⁴ : SemilatticeSup G₀
a : G₀
inst✝³ : ZeroLEOneClass G₀
inst✝² : MulPosStrictMono G₀
inst✝¹ : MulPosReflectLE G₀
inst✝ : PosMulReflectLT G₀
ha : LT.lt 0 a
f : ι → G₀
s : Finset ι
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv (s.sup' hs f) a) (s.sup' hs fun i => HDiv.hDiv (f i) a)
decl:
lemma sup'_div₀ [ZeroLEOneClass G₀] [MulPosStrictMono G₀] [MulPosReflectLE G₀] [PosMulReflectLT G₀]
    (ha : 0 < a) (f : ι → G₀) (s : Finset ι) (hs) : s.sup' hs f / a = s.sup' hs fun i ↦ f i / a :=
  map_finset_sup' (OrderIso.divRight₀ _ ha) hs f

name: Finset.sup_div₀
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G₀ : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero G₀
inst✝ : OrderBot G₀
a : G₀
ha : LT.lt 0 a
s : Finset ι
f : ι → G₀
⊢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv (s.sup f) a) (s.sup fun i => HDiv.hDiv (f i) a)
decl:
lemma sup_div₀ [LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero G₀] [OrderBot G₀] {a : G₀} (ha : 0 < a)
    (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → G₀) : s.sup f / a = s.sup fun i ↦ f i / a := by
  obtain rfl | hs := s.eq_empty_or_nonempty
  · simp [← show (0 : G₀) = ⊥ from bot_unique zero_le']
  rw [← Finset.sup'_eq_sup hs, ← Finset.sup'_eq_sup hs, sup'_div₀ (ha := ha)]
